授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to build on their grasp of presentation basics and have greater confidence while doing more complex speaking and listening projects as well as large group discussions.
到達目標:
1. Students will be able to converse about academic subjects pausing only rarely.

2. Students will be able to identify the key details of academic speeches, presentations, and films.

3. Students will be able to create and execute well-organized presentations using impressive visual aids.

4. Students will be able to take leadership roles in teams while working on large-scale projects entirely in English.

5. Students will be able to guide group discussions in English.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1: The class will focus on topic in the textbook with additional supplementary materials.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour for homework each week.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Mid-term Exam 20 , Final Exam 20, Weekly Writing Journal 20, homework, quizzes and presentations 40.
